name: nuxt-content
description: Comprehensive skill for building content-driven sites with Nuxt Content v3. Use when: setting up git-based CMS, creating blogs/docs with Markdown, implementing content collections, deploying to Cloudflare/Vercel, integrating Nuxt Studio, querying content with SQL-like syntax, implementing MDC components, setting up full-text search, or encountering errors like 'Collection not found', 'DB is not defined', 'database is locked', or schema validation errors. Covers: content collections (page/data types), Zod/Valibot schemas, queryCollection() API, navigation utilities, MDC syntax, ContentRenderer, Prose components, Cloudflare D1 deployment, Vercel deployment, Nuxt Studio setup, OAuth configuration, and all 18 documented issues with prevention strategies.
